title: Playing URF feels like I'm rediscovering League
body:
I remember when I was first learning League it was like "oh shit, new champion, what does this one do?" and playing all the champions that I thought looked cool without giving a fuck about if I fed or not.

Of course URF doesn't give new champions, but when I play URF I can have the same experience I did when I first got League. Running around, trying new builds, not giving a fuck.

Thanks Riot.
